Q: 如何利用Google软件为OpenWSN增加和修改Web页面?
R: You can use [http://pages.google.com/ Google Page Creator] to create web pages, and then create a link to them from your project's front page. Google's [http://www.writely.com/ Writely] is another great way to collaboratively create documents and publish them on the web. Or, link from your project to any existing web pages.

[http://code.google.com/support/bin/answer.py?answer=56579&topic=&ctx=sibling]

Q: 如果project达到了google规定的最大限制,怎么办?
R: contact code-hosting@google.com to discuss the situation. 

[http://code.google.com/support/bin/answer.py?answer=56591&query=subversion&topic=&type=]
